file title	:  Flow Accumulation
data type	:	Integer
file type	:	ArcGrid ASCII	
columns	:	36000
rows	:	18000
ref. system	:	lat/long
ref. units	:	deg
unit dist	:	1.00
min. X	:	-180.00
max. X	:	180.00
min. Y	:	-90.00
max. Y	:	90.00
pos'n error	:	unknown
resolution	:	0.01
min. value	:	0
max. value	:	5880712
value units	:	number of cells
flag value	:	none
flag def'n	:	none
legend cats	:	0
comments	:	Data in the original file represents the number of 
comments	:	cells which flow into each downslope cell. Value ranges
comments	:	from 0 at topographic highs to very large numbers(on 
comments	:	the order of millions) at the mouth of large rivers.
comments	:	In the pgm file, NoData(Ocean etc.) is represented as
comments	:	255, MinValue as 0, MaxValue as 254, other data are 
comments	:	LOGARITHMLY scaled between 0 and 254 because the 
comments	:	frequecies of large data are very small.
